text:
@AC360 @andersoncooper Todays Covid19  count. America is dying in record numbers.... 😷😷🤥🤥
🇨🇳 has  83,221 cases.  4,634  DEATHS 
🇺🇸 has  2.16 million cases. 118,000 DEATHS 
🇰🇷 has  12,151 cases.  278  DEATHS 
🇻🇳 has  334  cases.  ZERO  DEATHS.
Let that sink in. This administration is killing us.
